headers.subject: Re: [osol-discuss] AM3 support

body.para:
I went ahead and bought the ECS 790 AM3 motherboard. Everything on it works with
build 113 except the buggy rge driver which starts working but fizzles out.
Cheap fix is to buy a cheap nic card.
